|brand = Sitecom |model = WLR-4100 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = v1 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 03/04/2020‎ |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/Sitecom_WLR-4100 |wlclass = N300 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = U2M-WBR4100 |icid = 3616C-WBR4100 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 7016A072100G |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7620A; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24KEc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 580 <!-- 580 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = 32-bit
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5TU32M16DG-AC; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA8337;QCA8337-AL3C; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, Mini PCIe |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = 192.168.0.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = ''randomly generated'' |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Senao |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = Discontinued |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 03/2013 |estprice = 50 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00AZZHDG4 |asin_country = US |asin2 = B00AZZHDG4 |asin_country2 = IT |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Specifications=== *[[Sitecom WLR-4100]] (PCB: [http://images.shoutwiki.com/en.techinfodepot/9/96/Wlr4100v1002light_441.jpg v1.0]/[http://images.shoutwiki.com/en.techinfodepot/0/05/Wlr4100_axyQHa8.jpg v2.1]) :CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7620A @580MHz WiSoC :Flash: 8MB, RAM: 64MB, USB: 1x USB 2.0 :WLAN: [[MediaTek]] MT7620A (2.4GHz) :Switch: QCA8337 (v1)/RTL8367RB (v2) :802.11b/g/n, GbE 4x LAN + 1x WAN

==See also== <!-- FCC ID: U2M (Senao) :U2M-CAP4100AG (2016-06-06) - Wireless FORTI AP-221B :U2M-CAP4200AG (2016-06-07) - Wireless 802.11abgn Access Point :U2M-WBR2100AFN (2013-02-20) - 802.11bgn Wireless Router :U2M-WBR4200AGN (2012-11-28) - 802.11abgn Wireless Router :U2M-WBR5200MGN (2012-01-04) - 802.11abgn Wireless Router --> ===Models=== :;[[Sitecom]] • [[List of Sitecom Wireless Devices|Devices]] • [https://www.speedguide.net/broadband-list.php?brand=75 Products] *[[Sitecom WLR-3100]] - Wireless N300 Gigabit Router X3 *[[Sitecom WLR-4100]] - Wireless N300 Gigabit Router X4 • [http://www.bol.com/nl/p/sitecom-wlr-4100-wireless-n300-gigabit-router-x4-300-mbps/9200000010220432/ NL] • [https://www.sitecom.com/en/n300-wi-fi-gigabit-router-x4/wlr-4100/p/1585 PPage] *[[Sitecom WLR-5002]] - Wireless AC750 Dual-Band Gigabit Router [https://www.amazon.de/SITECOM-WLR-5002-Dual-Band-Gigabit-Router/dp/B00GWOHMKO X5] • [http://www.madshrimps.be/vbulletin/f22/sitecom-extends-802-11ac-product-line-ac750-wi-fi-router-ac600-wi-fi-adapter-115742/ PR] *[[Sitecom WLR-6000]] - Wireless N750 Gigabit Dual-Band Router X6 *[[Sitecom WLR-6100]] - Wireless N900 Gigabit Dual-Band Router X6 *[[Sitecom WLR-7100]] - Wireless AC1200 Gigabit Dual-Band Router X7 *[[Sitecom WLR-8100]] - Wireless AC1750 Gigabit Dual-Band Router X8 *[[Sitecom WLR-8200]] - Wireless AC1750 Gigabit Dual-Band Router X8 *[[Sitecom WLR-9000]] - Wireless AC1900 Gigabit Dual-Band Router X9 *[[Sitecom WLR-9500]] - Wireless AC2600 Gigabit Dual-Band Router X9
